name: Shankara
overview: Welcome to Shankara, the quest for magic stones! Shankara is a single player, overhead 2D-view arcade-adventure game created by Simone Zannotti; it requires an Amiga with: - 3MB Ram, - Hard Disk,- 68020+ and a Joystick. There is a level editor too, for creating new adventures! Find your way into ancient, foreboding pyramids, past traps and dangers untold to find the hidden treasures and mysteries of history.
